title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Cessna 172 - autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we to use the autopilot in a Cessna 172 Skyhawk.

We will depart from Rotterdam The Hague Airport Runway 24 fly over the southern part of the Netherlands using the different autopilot options and will return to Rotterdam The Hague Airport where we will land using the localizer off runway 24.

In this video the following addons are used:

Port of Rotterdam 
https://flightsim.to/file/2110/port-of-rotterdam

Rotterdam Iconic Building Pack
https://flightsim.to/file/1351/rotterdam-megapack

Rotterdam - Brienenoord Bridge
https://flightsim.to/file/328/rotterdam-brienenoord-bridge

In addition to this have a look at the additional addons available at flysim.to for Rotterdam:

https://flightsim.to/discover/rotterdam
